name: Gunmetal satchel
description:
Modern and roomy leather bag that adds a touch of glam to any outfit

Style 
... 
Crackled and distressed leather handbag which doubles as a shoulder bag.  Easily fits your iPad or e-reder with plenty of room for personal items.

Details 
... 
Dimensions
The bag is approximately 12.5" wide at the top and bottom, and measures 19.5" at it's widest point.  It is 7" deep (front to back) and around 10"tall.
Straps are 20" long, and easily fit over the shoulder.
Made from distressed and crackled Italian cowhide with metallic finish with black leather straps
The leather has a textured feel which becomes softer with use
Fully lined with black brushed cotton twill 
4 interior slip pockets for organization 
High contrast  premium YKK zipper with  leather pull

... 
Ships in 5-7 business days.

Slight differences in marks and grain are inherent characteristics of natural leathers, making each bag unique. Colors may vary due to monitor settings. 
Swatches are available upon request. 
All questions are welcome

name: Long zip pouch - Crimson
description:
This compact clutch is the perfect size for stashing all your small items. Made of genuine metallic leather, this pouch is luxe enough to carry in hand but small enough to toss in your favorite tote. Either way, your essentials all stay in one place.

Details 
... 
Approximately 10" wide and 4" tall. 
Made from crackled and distressed metallic leather 
Fully lined with black cotton twill
Premium YKK metal zipper 

Slight differences in color shading, marks and grain are inherent characteristics of the lush, natural leathers chosen to create our collection. Color may vary due to monitor settings.

name: Black leather mini clutch
description:
Simple, useful and fashionable.

The leather pouch holds all the important things you carry on daily basis and is suitable for both men and women.

It is made from naked cow hide and is lined with brushed cotton twill.
The leather used is quite thick and sturdy, and has an incredibly soft hand. It will age beautifully and last for years to come. 
Contrasting YKK zipper with metal teeth and a durable chain pull gives the bag a modern and somewhat edgy look. Your choice of gold or silver finish. 

Easily holds your keys, phone, camera, cash, small notebooks , pens...
It's a perfect accessory for those of us that are always on the run.
Approximate measurements are 8" wide and 5.5" tall when flat.

Carry it as a clutch or use it as an organizational insert for your larger bags.

The bag is made to order in our studio and ships in 3-5 days after purchase.

name: Mini shopper
description:
Sleek, minimal and versatile 

The mini shopper is a flat zipper style tote, made from hand selected full grain Italian leather. It is lined with silver metallic linen. 
The leather is thick and sturdy with incredibly soft hand. Ages beautifully.

Measurements are approx. 12" wide x 12" 
2 interior slip pockets
Straps are approx. 16" from end to end
Metal zipper closure

Great bag for day and night use.

Made to order in our NYC studio. Ships in 3-7 days after purchase.

*Slight differences in color shading, marks and grain are inherent characteristics of natural leathers. 
Color may vary due to monitor settings.
Swatches are available upon request.
All questions are welcome.

name: Large denim tote
description:
This  tote is a larger version of our popular Mini shopper. 
It's 14.5" wide and 15" tall, with straps long enough to fit over your shoulder.

Made from premium cotton denim and genuine leather trim and straps.
Inside of the bag is lined with sanded cotton twill and features 2 slip pockets. 
Zipper closure.

Large enough to fit laptops, binders, etc...  Great for daily use.  

This item is made to order and ships in 5-7 days.

name: Black leather portfolio clutch
description:
Sleek, minimal and versatile 

The portfolio clutch is made from hand selected Italian leather and is fully lined with brushed cotton twill. 
Leather is thick and sturdy with incredibly soft hand. It will age beautifully. 
Exposed zipper and freeform leather pull give the bag a modern and edgy look. 

Measurements are approx. 15" wide x 11.5" tall
2 interior slip pockets, 7" x 6" each
Zipper opening allows 14" space

Fits laptops up to 13", standard size folders, portfolios, magazines, sketch books ...etc... 
Perfect for meetings, interviews or daily use.

Easily transforms to a roomy clutch.

Made to order in our NYC studio. Ships in 3-7 days after purchase.


*Slight differences in color shading, marks and grain are inherent characteristics of natural leathers. 
Color may vary due to monitor settings.
Swatches are available upon request.
All questions are welcome.
